eas_text: A civil authority has issued AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: Pinal, AZ; at 02:49 PM ON DEC 11, 2025 Effective until 10:49 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Pinal County. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. The Tucson Police Department is looking for 73-year-old Munyagitari Kwisebura last seen on foot. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
